      Methods in org.deeplearning4j.nn.conf with parameters of type CacheMode 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      NeuralNetConfiguration.Builder NeuralNetConfiguration.Builder.cacheMode(CacheMode cacheMode)
      This method defines how/if preOutput cache is handled: NONE: cache disabled (default value) HOST: Host memory will be used DEVICE: GPU memory will be used (on CPU backends effect will be the same as for HOST)
      MultiLayerConfiguration.Builder MultiLayerConfiguration.Builder.cacheMode(CacheMode cacheMode)
      This method defines how/if preOutput cache is handled: NONE: cache disabled (default value) HOST: Host memory will be used DEVICE: GPU memory will be used (on CPU backends effect will be the same as for HOST)
